title: pprof on windows is broken
body:
go tool pprof (the demangling part alone?) does not seem to work on windows

>go version
go version devel +bf1cd157b3e0 Sat Aug 03 18:32:14 2013 +1000 windows/amd64

pprof seems to have 

>go tool pprof ./tmsg.test.exe ./cpu.out
The system cannot find the path specified.
The system cannot find the path specified.
The system cannot find the path specified.
The system cannot find the path specified.
The system cannot find the path specified.
The system cannot find the path specified.
The system cannot find the path specified.
The system cannot find the path specified.
Welcome to pprof!  For help, type 'help'.
(pprof) top
Total: 67 samples
       3   4.5%   4.5%        3   4.5% 000000000045f852
       2   3.0%   7.5%        2   3.0% 000000000044c763
       2   3.0%  10.4%        2   3.0% 00000000004a6386
       1   1.5%  11.9%        1   1.5% 00000000004068e2
       1   1.5%  13.4%        1   1.5% 0000000000407147
       1   1.5%  14.9%        1   1.5% 0000000000407ab8
       1   1.5%  16.4%        1   1.5% 00000000004104a9
       1   1.5%  17.9%        1   1.5% 00000000004104b8
       1   1.5%  19.4%        1   1.5% 000000000041bd7a
       1   1.5%  20.9%        1   1.5% 000000000041d8e0

My OS has neither cygwin nor mysys.

From past issues reported as below, it may be working for "some" people
(cygwin & mysys?)
          https://golang.org/issue/3879
          https://golang.org/cl/6445082
